transactions.text: Total transaction sent and received by this account.

storage_usage.title: Storage Used
storage_usage.text: Total blockchain storage (in bytes) used by this account.

native_account_balance.title: Ⓝ Native Account Balance
native_account_balance.text: NEAR protocol defines a liquid balance for every account, this is directly used to pay for transactions issued by this account, but it is not the "total" balance of all the tokens you may control through this account; see "Aggregated Balace" for more details.

validator_stake.title: Ⓝ Validator Stake
validator_stake.text:
This NEAR is actively being used to back a validator and secure the network. When you decide to unstake this NEAR, it will take some time to be shown in your Available Balance, as NEAR takes 3 epochs (~36 hours) to unstake.

This field only reflects NEAR balance for validators that stake to support the security of the network. If you’re staking (delegating) to a validator pool from a wallet, you will see "0" in this field. See the balance profile on Wallet for more balances aggregated for your convenience.

balance_profile.title: Ⓝ Balance Profile
balance_profile.text: NEAR tokens can be locked in contracts, staked, and delegated, and sometimes we cannot even track them down without your help. Wallet Profile page is the place where we consolidate most of the balances we can aggregate from various sources, so if you want to estimate "total" balance, it is the best place.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.text: Date and time when this account was created. Some of the accounts are included in the very first block of the network called genesis.

created_by_transaction.title: Created By Transaction
created_by_transaction.text: You can inspect the transaction which created this account.

deleted_at.title: Deleted At
deleted_at.text: Date and time when this account was deleted.

deleted_by_transaction.title: Deleted By Transaction
deleted_by_transaction.text: You can inspect the transaction which deleted this account.

lockup_account.title: Lockup Account
lockup_account.text: Lockup is a special smart contract that ensures that the full amount or even a partial amount is not transferable until it is supposed to be.

block_height.title: Block Height
block_height.desc1: The most recent block height recorded to the blockchain.
block_height.desc2: The block height is a sequential number of the most recent block in the blockchain.
block_height.desc3: For example, a block height of 1000 indicates that up to 1001 blocks may exist in the blockchain (genesis + blocks 0-1000). In NEAR, there is not guaranteed to be a block for each sequential number, e.g. block 982 does not necessarily exist.

avg_block_time.title: Avg block time
avg_block_time.desc: Average time for producing one block.

24h_total.title: 24hr Total
24h_total.desc: The number of transactions in the last 24 hours.

gas_price.title: Gas Price
gas_price.desc: A unit of Tgas (TerraGas) is 1*10^12 units of gas. The costs of gas are very low in terms of NEAR, which is why Tgas is more commonly used.

Search.title: Search
Search.hint: Search for Account ID, Txn hash, Block hash, or Block height
